body:
@bradfitz In the case of https://github.com/cloudfoundry/gorouter/issues/60 the client is a Commercial off the shelf web based product performing an xhr request.  Because it is a commercial product it is not easily modified unlike a custom build application.  The Server is a Java Tomcat Server.

The javacript in this commercial application is obviously not supposed to send `//foo` requests.  But, the desire here is that regardless of this client invalid request we'd like to write a transparent proxy using go http that doesn't munge a request like this.
